articles.author: Wayne Cole
articles.title: Asia shares rally as China measures boost market - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares rallied on Monday as China announced new measures to support its ailing markets, though the mood was cautious ahead of readings on U.S. jobs and inflation that could decide whether interest rates have to rise again.
articles.content: SYDNEY, Aug 28 (Reuters) - Asian shares rallied on Monday as China announced new measures to support its ailing markets, though the mood was cautious ahead of readings on U.S. jobs and inflation that… [+4139 chars]

articles.title: Wasim Akram's 'not easy' verdict for Team India days before Pakistan face-off - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The former Pakistan captain made a major remark on Team India as it prepares for the upcoming Asia Cup. | Cricket
articles.content: The subcontinent giants will clash in the marquee Asia Cup from August 30, that serves as key to preparations for the upcoming ODI World Cup in October-November. The Indian squad, announced on Monday… [+2548 chars]
